title: Water card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a tsunami destroying a peaceful coastal village.}} The Water card turns nearby dungeon floor into open [[water]]. The floor at the player's feet will remain unchanged. * Power level 0: Each floor square within four squares of the player has a 50% chance of becoming [[shallow water]]. * Power level 1: Each floor square within six squares of the player has a 25% chance to be turned into [[shallow water]] and 25% chance to be turned into [[deep water]]. The same six-square-radius area will then be "deepened" twice, increasing the proportion of the area that is water, and the proportion of the water that is deep. * Power level 2: All visible floor is turned into water, destroying traps in the process. Each floor square converted that is not the player's current square has a 50% chance of being [[deep water]].
